Topic.Title: "if and "Then" scripts on the web creator

Posts.EditableText: In the tutorial, on the using scripts page, it says to "click the 'then' header", which isn't on the page below the "if" script. how do I open that tab in the web creator?
Posts.HTML: In the tutorial, on the using scripts page, it says to "click the 'then' header", which isn't on the page below the "if" script. how do I open that tab in the web creator?

Posts.EditableText: The +Add New Script under the If selection is your 'Then'
Posts.HTML: The +Add New Script under the If selection is your 'Then'

Posts.EditableText:
XM speaks the truth!
